step.xtrf: file:/Users/haihai/Desktop/mac研一上/英汉技术写作/I-HATE-Zotero/Zotero%20guide/8卸载/卸载（Windows）/Uninstall_windows.dita

cmd.xtrf: file:/Users/haihai/Desktop/mac研一上/英汉技术写作/I-HATE-Zotero/Zotero%20guide/8卸载/卸载（Windows）/Uninstall_windows.dita

step.cmd: 按“Windows”+“I”键打开“设置”窗口，或点击“开始”菜单中的齿轮图标。

info.xtrf: file:/Users/haihai/Desktop/mac研一上/英汉技术写作/I-HATE-Zotero/Zotero%20guide/8卸载/卸载（Windows）/Uninstall_windows.dita

image.xtrf: file:/Users/haihai/Desktop/mac研一上/英汉技术写作/I-HATE-Zotero/Zotero%20guide/8卸载/卸载（Windows）/Uninstall_windows.dita

step.xtrf: file:/Users/haihai/Desktop/mac研一上/英汉技术写作/I-HATE-Zotero/Zotero%20guide/8卸载/卸载（Windows）/Uninstall_windows.dita

cmd.xtrf: file:/Users/haihai/Desktop/mac研一上/英汉技术写作/I-HATE-Zotero/Zotero%20guide/8卸载/卸载（Windows）/Uninstall_windows.dita

step.cmd: 在设置窗口中，点击 “应用”，进入应用程序设置。

info.xtrf: file:/Users/haihai/Desktop/mac研一上/英汉技术写作/I-HATE-Zotero/Zotero%20guide/8卸载/卸载（Windows）/Uninstall_windows.dita

image.xtrf: file:/Users/haihai/Desktop/mac研一上/英汉技术写作/I-HATE-Zotero/Zotero%20guide/8卸载/卸载（Windows）/Uninstall_windows.dita

step.xtrf: file:/Users/haihai/Desktop/mac研一上/英汉技术写作/I-HATE-Zotero/Zotero%20guide/8卸载/卸载（Windows）/Uninstall_windows.dita

cmd.xtrf: file:/Users/haihai/Desktop/mac研一上/英汉技术写作/I-HATE-Zotero/Zotero%20guide/8卸载/卸载（Windows）/Uninstall_windows.dita

step.cmd: 在应用列表中找到 Zotero，或在搜索框中输入“Zotero”。

info.xtrf: file:/Users/haihai/Desktop/mac研一上/英汉技术写作/I-HATE-Zotero/Zotero%20guide/8卸载/卸载（Windows）/Uninstall_windows.dita

image.xtrf: file:/Users/haihai/Desktop/mac研一上/英汉技术写作/I-HATE-Zotero/Zotero%20guide/8卸载/卸载（Windows）/Uninstall_windows.dita

step.xtrf: file:/Users/haihai/Desktop/mac研一上/英汉技术写作/I-HATE-Zotero/Zotero%20guide/8卸载/卸载（Windows）/Uninstall_windows.dita

cmd.xtrf: file:/Users/haihai/Desktop/mac研一上/英汉技术写作/I-HATE-Zotero/Zotero%20guide/8卸载/卸载（Windows）/Uninstall_windows.dita

step.cmd: 点击 Zotero，点击 “卸载” 按钮，确认卸载。

info.xtrf: file:/Users/haihai/Desktop/mac研一上/英汉技术写作/I-HATE-Zotero/Zotero%20guide/8卸载/卸载（Windows）/Uninstall_windows.dita

image.xtrf: file:/Users/haihai/Desktop/mac研一上/英汉技术写作/I-HATE-Zotero/Zotero%20guide/8卸载/卸载（Windows）/Uninstall_windows.dita

step.xtrf: file:/Users/haihai/Desktop/mac研一上/英汉技术写作/I-HATE-Zotero/Zotero%20guide/8卸载/卸载（Windows）/Uninstall_windows.dita

cmd.xtrf: file:/Users/haihai/Desktop/mac研一上/英汉技术写作/I-HATE-Zotero/Zotero%20guide/8卸载/卸载（Windows）/Uninstall_windows.dita

step.cmd: 在Zotero Uninstall窗口中点击“Next”，进入下一步。

info.xtrf: file:/Users/haihai/Desktop/mac研一上/英汉技术写作/I-HATE-Zotero/Zotero%20guide/8卸载/卸载（Windows）/Uninstall_windows.dita

step.xtrf: file:/Users/haihai/Desktop/mac研一上/英汉技术写作/I-HATE-Zotero/Zotero%20guide/8卸载/卸载（Windows）/Uninstall_windows.dita

cmd.xtrf: file:/Users/haihai/Desktop/mac研一上/英汉技术写作/I-HATE-Zotero/Zotero%20guide/8卸载/卸载（Windows）/Uninstall_windows.dita

step.cmd: 如需删除电脑中的个人数据及个性化设置，请勾选“Remove my Zotero personal data and customizations”；如不需要请忽略。
